name: Fellowship.AI
description:
Fellowship Program:
Data Science is not knowledge to be acquired but rather an art that can be learned through practice.  The number one qualification employers look for when hiring a data science candidate is previous experience.  The Startup.ML fellowship gives aspiring data scientists the chance to hone their skills by building machine learning systems for startups.  

Working with Startups:
We help startups use machine learning as a key differentiator. Our world-class data scientists actively engage with startups for a year to ensure that machine learning techniques are successfully embedded into new products and a smooth transition is made to an in-house team.  We then take on the role of a trusted advisor and provide counsel to founders to set them up for continued success.

team.name: Arshak Navruzyan
team.bioHtml: Current on ML and Hadoop.  VP product roles at various big data venture funded startups.

team.title: Machine Learning Fellow
team.name: Sharath Kalkur
team.bioHtml: UIC-ECE, Skilled in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Computer Vision

team.title: Mentor
team.name: Karen Chaltikian
team.bioHtml:
Works as a Director of Research at a Quantitative hedge fund. Mentor at Startup.ML
Worked at BlackRock and Barclays
PhD Theoretical Physics, Stanford

jobs.title: Machine Learning Remote Fellowship in San Francisco (fellowship.ai/apply)
jobs.description:
Data Science is not knowledge to be acquired but rather an art that must be learned through practice.  The number one qualification employers look for when hiring a data science candidate is previous experience.  Our fellowship gives aspiring data scientists the chance to hone their skills by building real-world machine learning applications.    

- build scalable machine learning models with agile software development methodology 
- full-time for 4 months mentoring by seasoned data scientists pair program with other fellows and mentors we are based in San Francisco, New York, London and Singapore 
- apply latest research in deep learning, ensemble learners, optimization techniques, etc.  

Check out https://platform.ai/blog which showcases the work done by some of our fellows.

Fellows from previous cohorts are now in data science roles at Uber Advanced Technologies Center, Google Brain, Sentient Technologies, Yelp, Orange,  etc.

- interface directly with commercial customers
- work on enhancement to the solution portfolio https://launchpad.ai/solutions


Please apply at www.fellowship.ai/apply

jobs.descriptionHtml:
Data Science is not knowledge to be acquired but rather an art that must be learned through practice. The number one qualification employers look for when hiring a data science candidate is previous experience. Our fellowship gives aspiring data scientists the chance to hone their skills by building real-world machine learning applications.

  • build scalable machine learning models with agile software development methodology
  • full-time for 4 months mentoring by seasoned data scientists pair program with other fellows and mentors we are based in San Francisco, New York, London and Singapore
  • apply latest research in deep learning, ensemble learners, optimization techniques, etc.

Check out https://platform.ai/blog which showcases the work done by some of our fellows.

Fellows from previous cohorts are now in data science roles at Uber Advanced Technologies Center, Google Brain, Sentient Technologies, Yelp, Orange, etc.

jobs.descriptionHtml:
Data Science is not knowledge to be acquired but rather an art that must be learned through practice. The number one qualification employers look for when hiring a data science candidate is previous experience. Our fellowship gives aspiring data scientists the chance to hone their skills by building real-world machine learning applications.

  • build scalable machine learning models with agile software development methodology
  • full-time for 4 months mentoring by seasoned data scientists pair program with other fellows and mentors we are based in San Francisco, New York, London and Singapore
  • apply latest research in deep learning, ensemble learners, optimization techniques, etc.
  • interface directly with commercial customers
  • work on enhancement to the solution portfolio https://launchpad.ai/solutions

Check out https://platform.ai/blog which showcases the work done by some of our fellows.

Fellows from previous cohorts are now in data science roles at Uber Advanced Technologies Center, Google Brain, Sentient Technologies, Yelp, Orange, etc.

Please apply at www.fellowship.ai/apply
